scripts.dev:typegraphql: nx run nx-plugin-typegraphql:build && cd .\dist\packages\nx-plugin-typegraphql\ && pnpm link
scripts.dev:midway: nx run nx-plugin-midway:build && cd .\dist\packages\nx-plugin-midway\ && pnpm link
scripts.dev:prisma: nx run nx-plugin-prisma:build && cd .\dist\packages\nx-plugin-prisma\ && pnpm link
scripts.dev:serverless: nx run nx-plugin-serverless:build && cd .\dist\packages\nx-plugin-serverless\ && pnpm link
scripts.dev:esbuild: nx run nx-plugin-esbuild:build --with-deps && cd .\dist\packages\nx-plugin-esbuild\ && pnpm link && pnpm link esbuild-plugin-decorators && pnpm link esbuild-plugin-node-externals && pnpm link esbuild-plugin-hash && pnpm link esbuild-plugin-filesize
scripts.dev:swc: nx run nx-plugin-swc:build && cd .\dist\packages\nx-plugin-swc\ && pnpm link
scripts.dev:vite: nx run nx-plugin-vite:build && cd .\dist\packages\nx-plugin-vite\ && pnpm link
scripts.dev:umi: nx run nx-plugin-umi:build && cd .\dist\packages\nx-plugin-umi\ && pnpm link
scripts.dev:snowpack: nx run nx-plugin-snowpack:build && cd .\dist\packages\nx-plugin-snowpack\ && pnpm link
scripts.dev:esbuild:decorator: nx run esbuild-plugin-decorator:build && cd .\dist\packages\esbuild-plugin-decorator\ && pnpm link
scripts.dev:esbuild:externals: nx run esbuild-plugin-node-externals:build && cd .\dist\packages\esbuild-plugin-node-externals\ && pnpm link
scripts.dev:esbuild:hash: nx run esbuild-plugin-hash:build && cd .\dist\packages\esbuild-plugin-hash\ && pnpm link
scripts.dev:esbuild:filesize: nx run esbuild-plugin-filesize:build && cd .\dist\packages\esbuild-plugin-filesize\ && pnpm link
scripts.link-plugins: pnpm link esbuild-plugin-decorators && pnpm link esbuild-plugin-node-externals
scripts.unlink-plugins: pnpm unlink esbuild-plugin-decorators && pnpm unlink esbuild-plugin-node-externals
